name: bike-comparison
description: This project is a bike comparison website that scrapes bike prices from various sources, stores the data in MongoDB, and displays it using a Next.js frontend with an Express API.

scripts.install: npm run install-server && npm run install-frontend
scripts.watch: npm run server & npm run frontend
scripts.build: npm run build-server & npm run build-frontend
scripts.start: npm run start-server & npm run start-frontend
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run start

author: Lucas Pierru
